column5: Can you please tell me the title of the manga?

I'm in your exact situation! She makes fun of me with her boyfriend on the phone, saying things like "she is lazy" "she never does anything" "she woke up very late" and when I tell her to stop, she tells me she wasn't making fun of me and I am too susceptible

I'm at school right now, and I am in your exact situation. I got diagnosed yesterday, I have depression, and my friends are isolating me. I don't want to talk to them either, so I think I'm fine with it. But they never ask me to hang out, and just now they're exchanging their Christmas presents. Obviously they didn't think of a gift for me. I'm glad that today is the last day of school
Dense liquid inside my body. Sometimes I can feel it in my legs, when it's worse it's in my stomach, and sometimes right in my throat
